summary.para: Called when the byte stream redirects to a URL.

param.name: pszUrl
param.para: The URL to which the connection has been redirected.

param.name: pvbCancel
param.para: To cancel the redirection, set this parameter to VARIANT_TRUE. To allow the redirection, set this parameter to VARIANT_FALSE.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Called when the byte stream requests a URL.

param.name: pszUrl
param.para: The URL that the byte stream is requesting.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Notifies the application when a byte stream requests a URL, and enables the application to block URL redirection.

item.description: Query the byte stream object for the interface.
Call to set the MFNETSOURCE_RESOURCE_FILTER attribute.
